<h3 id="X38154">X(38154) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(4), X(8), X(9)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6-5*(b+c)*a^5+8*(b^2+b*c+c^2)*a^4-2*(b+c)*(b^2+4*b*c+c^2)*a^3-(7*b^2+10*b*c+7*c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^2+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(7*b^2+6*b*c+7*c^2)*a-2*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38154) = X(4)+2*X(24393) = 4*X(5)-X(3243) = X(9)+2*X(355) = 4*X(10)-X(5732) = 2*X(142)-5*X(5818) = X(944)-4*X(6666) = 2*X(1001)+X(5881) = 2*X(5223)+X(5735) = X(5223)+5*X(37714) = 3*X(5587)-X(38036) = 3*X(5790)-X(38121) = 3*X(21153)-4*X(38130) = 2*X(38036)-3*X(38150) = 2*X(38037)-3*X(38075) = 2*X(38043)-3*X(38108) = 3*X(38057)-2*X(38130) = 3*X(38074)-X(38149) = 3*X(38075)-4*X(38158) = 3*X(38097)-2*X(38126) = 3*X(38097)-4*X(38175) = 2*X(38121)-3*X(38200)</b>
<p>X(38154) lies on these lines: {1,6886}, {4,24393}, {5,3243}, {9,355}, {10,5732}, {30,38097}, {80,15298}, {142,5818}, {515,21153}, {516,3543}, {518,5587}, {519,38037}, {527,38074}, {944,6666}, {952,38043}, {954,5727}, {971,5790}, {1001,5881}, {1445,9613}, {1503,38190}, {1699,3681}, {1737,4321}, {1750,25006}, {2550,6256}, {2801,10861}, {2829,38211}, {3434,30326}, {3436,5223}, {3617,36991}, {4326,10039}, {4882,12617}, {5261,5542}, {5290,30329}, {5690,31672}, {5728,9578}, {5762,38138}, {5805,18357}, {5809,31397}, {5815,19925}, {5817,5853}, {5842,38212}, {5844,38139}, {5846,38145}, {5854,38159}, {5855,38160}, {5856,38156}, {5857,38157}, {6173,38172}, {7672,9612}, {7675,31434}, {7988,31146}, {9624,15570}, {9956,20195}, {10157,24392}, {10175,38053}, {10573,12560}, {10827,18412}, {11372,33559}, {11500,31446}, {12629,24389}, {15299,37710}, {18525,31658}, {28204,38031}, {28224,38113}, {28236,38059}, {38030,38093}, {38042,38122}</p>
<p>
X(38154) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (21153, 38057), (38031, 38179), (38037, 38158), (38053, 10175), (38122, 38042), (38126, 38175), (38150, 5587), (38200, 5790)<br>
X(38154) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (38037, 38158, 38075), (38126, 38175, 38097)<br>
</p>
